channel.title: Once Im admin I't wont let me Login
channel.description:
It quite annoying I make my self Admin by doing everything coretly (I'm Using Cheezscape) and I changed all the X91 to my Username to give me rights and what not. I set my rights to 3 = Owner in the character Section but now I wont let me login and the server crashes.
Also I was wondering How do I get the ::char working?

item.title: Once Im admin I't wont let me Login
item.dc:creator: @doggiedoo86 doggiedoo86
item.description:
@doggiedoo86 wrote:

i got this problem to the only thing you can do is to reinstall moparscape =(

Read full topic
